# Hip Strategy

- "when standing crosswise on a narrow balance beam, a more challenging task, the strategies used to maintain balance change" @effgenMeetingPhysicalTherapy2021.
- "A proximal to distal sequential activation of the abdominals, quadriceps, and tibialis anterior muscles will be used" @effgenMeetingPhysicalTherapy2021.
- Used in response to bigger threats to balance @effgenMeetingPhysicalTherapy2021
